sector.narrative: Education Management Information System (EMIS) (excluding learning assessment systems)
Education sector planning including coordinating role, SDG 4, etc.
Other activities for equitable access to quality education e.g. school feeding, school grants
Provision of (formal and non-formal) primary education (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision of primary education teacher training
Provision of training of school communities e.g. parent teacher associations, school management committees
Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: D’ici 2022, les acteurs aux niveaux central et décentralisé ont les capacités techniques pour assurer la continuité scolaire selon les standards de qualité

description.narrative: La reconnaissance et la validation des textes institutionalisant les COGES témoigne d'un sérieux engagement en faveur de l'implication communautaire dans la gestion scolaire cette année. D'autre part, le renforcement des compétences régionales, a généré une nouvelle dynamique visant l'amélioration des conditions d'enseignement ainsi que l'appropriation des outils. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/02/2020

title.narrative: System Strengthening - Learning assessment - Existence of a well-functioning classroom assessment system, including for early grades - score (1-4), see guidance
Service Delivery - Children provided with individual (one-per-child) education/early learning materials through UNICEF-supported programmes - see guidance

Service Delivery - Communities - School management committees (or parent teacher association or school communities or similar structure) whose capacity was developed through UNICEF-supported programmes - see guidance
% of schools with all planned classes (full education cycle)

Service Delivery - Emergency response - UNICEF-targeted children in humanitarian situations accessing formal or non-formal basic education (including pre-primary schools/early childhood learning spaces), see guidance
Fonctionnalit du systme d
